EncryptaGuard Services

Tell Me More

Services

Enterprise-grade network protection made simple for your business.

Asset Isolation & Compliance Shield

Total network isolation tailored to your business needs. Whether you require to physically partition Guest Wi-Fi from your POS systems or want to harden your entire internal infrastructure, we provide the isolation layer that stops lateral movement and ensures you meet modern digital compliance standards.

Bandwidth Integrity & Policy Enforcement

Reclaim your network for business-critical operations. We eliminate 'invisible weight' by blocking bandwidth-heavy distractions and malicious background trackers at the gateway. This ensures your infrastructure is dedicated to production while protecting your business from the data leaks and insider threats that standard firewalls miss.

Managed Continuity & Threat Intelligence

Your business never stops, and neither does your defense. We provide a fully managed threat-intelligence layer that evolves in real-time. With 24/7 remote health monitoring and automated 'Zero-Touch' security patches, your EncryptaGuard node stays hardened against emerging global vulnerabilities without you ever having to lift a finger.

The EncryptaGuard Mission

Enterprise-grade security, engineered for the small business edge.

In an era where small businesses are prime targets for cyber threats, relying on standard ISP equipment is no longer enough. EncryptaGuard provides a physical isolation model that removes the "invisible weight" of trackers and blocks threats before they ever reach your internal network.

Our architecture utilizes dedicated Protectli Vault hardware running a hardened Ubuntu-based layer. By processing data on-premise, we eliminate the latency of cloud-only filters, delivering a browsing experience up to 3x faster while ensuring absolute data privacy.

Transparency & Trust: EncryptaGuard is built on a foundation of open, industry-standard tools. We utilize Tailscale for secure, outbound-only management tunnels and Ansible for automated configuration syncing. No ports are ever opened on your firewall, keeping your business network invisible to the public internet.

Architected by a U.S. Army Veteran with 15+ years of Network Defense experience.

Connect with Lead Engineer

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about your new secure network.

It is a managed security device that sits between your internet modem and your Wi-Fi router. It acts as a "filter" that cleans your internet traffic of ads, trackers, and malware before they reach your devices.

While a firewall blocks unauthorized "doors" into your network, EncryptaGuard provides Content Intelligence. We stop your devices from connecting to known malicious websites and distraction-heavy services that standard firewalls ignore. It is the essential second layer of modern business security.

Standard ISP routers often send your browsing data unencrypted. EncryptaGuard uses Enterprise-Grade Encryption (DNS-over-HTTPS) to wrap your traffic in a secure tunnel, making it invisible to hackers and even your own ISP.

Actually, most users find their internet feels faster. Because we block thousands of "invisible" ad requests at the network level, your computers don't have to waste time downloading junk data.

A personal VPN protects the user, but it doesn't protect your business. EncryptaGuard ensures that your bandwidth isn't being wasted on non-work traffic (like social media) that slows down your critical business systems.

No. While our engine is world-class, EncryptaGuard is a Managed Fleet Solution. Absolutely not. One of our core pillars is absolute data privacy. All DNS filtering and security processing occur locally on your EncryptaGuard node before the data ever leaves your building.

Not for you. We use Zero-Touch Provisioning. We ship you a pre-configured node; you plug it in, and our automated systems handle the restâ€”including all security patches and performance updates.

Our nodes are monitored 24/7. If your network goes offline, we are alerted immediately. Your settings are saved securely on the device and will automatically resume protection the moment power is restored.
